title: Pafoo the new Ziron Nanook's version Nanook and the Zirons
description: Pafoo, the new Ziron (Nanook's version)Children's book for Kids 3 to 8 years oldThe Zirons Wiffi and Wiggy have something fantastic to show our young Eskimo boy. But what is it? You'll find out in this incredible adventure of Nanook.To spend a pleasant moment with your kid, buy Pafoo, the new Ziron now!
author: Francois Bissonnette
